cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemShortDescription: The Xperience by Kentico: Universal Migration Tool (UMT) is an open-source set of software libraries, documentation, and samples distributed via NuGet packages to facilitate and automate data import from external data sources into Xperience by Kentico. The Universal Migration Tool is part of the Xperience by Kentico Migration Toolkit.
cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemTitle: Xperience by Kentico Universal Migration Tool
cms.contentitemcommondata.ListableItemShortDescription: The Xperience by Kentico: Universal Migration Tool (UMT) is an open-source set of software libraries, documentation, and samples distributed via NuGet packages to facilitate and automate data import from external data sources into Xperience by Kentico. The Universal Migration Tool is part of the Xperience by Kentico Migration Toolkit.
cms.contentitemcommondata.ListableItemTitle: Xperience by Kentico Universal Migration Tool
